item.description: Let's go hot-tubing! This sounds like too much fun! Bring your shorts or bathing suit or nothing and jump in. We will have 1 tub with 5 of us. Bring your drink of choice...Food is allowed too. They provide towels. Some rooms have cd and cassette players. We have the tub for 2 hrs! The cost is $22.00 per person or less with a 5th person. This is reserved so please if you sign up show up! You will be responsible for payment if you cancel on short notice and I can't fill your spot or are a no-show. Come on now how often do you jump in the tub with a great group of lesbians. Can we make this a monthly event.......See you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the rubber ducky!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Oasis Hot-Tubing-Grafton Ma
